title: E-voting system using blockchain and python
short_description: Implementing an E-voting system using blockchain and python, which is based on a research paper entitled 'A Conceptual Secure Blockchain-based Electronic Voting System' by Ahmed Ben Ayed.

title: How to write clean code?
short_description: How to write the code that could be readable, reusable, and refactor-able is very challenging and interesting part in software development. Clean code is code that other developers can easily read, understand, and add to. Anyone can write a code that computer can understand but the only good programmer can write a code that human can understand.

title: Basic linux commands
short_description: Linux is the UNIX like operating system. The linux commands are run on the terminal, the terminal is like the command prompt of the windows OS. Linux is the open-source i.e. we  can simply change in Linux and redistribute it in our own name..
